column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I absolutely love common bond. I have dreams of owning my own bakery shop one day and Common Bond is everything I've imagine I would want. Everytime I go there (which is pretty often) is like walking into a dream. Colorful bakery boxes line the shelving as you walk in
column2: and there are options and options of delicious baked goods to your right. So many choices
column3: where do you start?! Do start by showing up before noon. Each time I've made this mistake of coming after
